mapper.update: update cobuy set stock = stock - #{quantity} where cobuy_no = #{quantity}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.* from ( SELECT c.* , m.nick ,cbi.image_no FROM cobuy c left outer join (select cobuy_no, min(image_no) image_no from cbi group by cobuy_no) cbi on c.cobuy_no = cbi.cobuy_no inner join member m on m.member_no = c.member_no WHERE c.hiddenyn = 'N' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM )TMP ) where rn between 1 and 6

select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.* from ( select c.* , m.nick ,cbi.image_no from cobuy c left outer join (select cobuy_no, min(image_no) image_no from cbi group by cobuy_no) cbi on c.cobuy_no = cbi.cobuy_no inner join member m on m.member_no = c.member_no inner join cmc on cmc.MIDDLE_NAME = c.MIDDLE_NAME inner join map on map.map_no = c.map_no where
cmc.URLPATH = #{category} and
instr(map.DETAILADDRESS ,#{goo} ) > 0 and
and instr( c.title ,#{keyword}) > 0 or instr( c.descript ,#{keyword}) > 0 or instr( c.PNAME ,#{keyword}) > 0 or instr( map.DETAILADDRESS ,#{keyword}) > 0
c.hiddenyn = 'N' order by c.cobuy_no desc )TMP ) where rn between ${startRow} and ${endRow}

select * from cobuy c inner join member m on c.member_no = m.member_no inner join mei on mei.member_no = m.member_no inner join map m on m.map_no = c.map_no where cobuy_no = #{cobuyNo} and c.HIDDENYN = 'N' AND m.HIDDENYN='N'
select * from image where image_no in (select min(image_no) from cbi where cobuy_no = #{cobuyNo}) order by image_no
select * from image where image_no in (select image_no from cbi where cobuy_no = #{cobuyNo}) order by image_no
select * from cobuy where COBUY_NO = #{productNo} and STOCK >= #{quantity}
